alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 8:49AM MST until January 26 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central South Dakota and southwest Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow blowing over or onto roadways may cause hazardous travel conditions. If traveling, drive to conditions.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
